text: 3:6 Jeremaia 31:31; Jon 6:63; Rom 7:6; 1 Korin 11:25; Galesia 3:10; Efesus 3:7; Kolosi 1:25; Hibru 8:6-8Ezɨ a uabɨ e gamizɨma, e Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiar kam, e an ingangarir gumazibar otifi. Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir kam, a bizir me akɨnafarimɨn osirizir puvatɨzim, mati Moses Osirizir Arazir fomɨram otoziba. Puvatɨ. Kar Godɨn Duamɨn bizim. Moses Osirizir Araziba gumazamizibagh amima me ovei. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim me ganɨdi.
